Text:
People of the Earth, please pay attention to the Jacque Fresco ideas. You may search at least for his speech in Stockholm. It is video:
"Greatest talk of Jacque Fresco" (English)
"Žakas Fresko Paskaita Stokholme" (Lietuviskai)
"Речь Жака Фреско в Стокгольме(Russian)".

A.S.NEILL
HIJOS
EN LIBERTAD

Francais:
Libres enfants de Summerhill

Τhanks for this incredible upload!
Raising up children without physical or psychological violence is a predicament if society is to advance genuinely ...
The results of summerhill were  promising and daring like the human freedom!
What is REALLY catastrophic is the obsession of some people to raise children in an oppressive manner...
Please upload the books of Wilhelm Reich (Friend of Neil and Summerhill) if you have them!

"Freedom - Not License!" and "Neill! Neill! Orange Peel!" books:
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8473872

"Summerhill Drama" - film (english audio, polish text):
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8476426

Some materials on Jacque Fresco
(at least: English, French,
Swedish, Spanish,Greek,
Lithuanian, Russian)
you may find here:
http://thepiratebay.sx/user/ratclnam/

Few more names of the Summerhill book:

ניל, ס. אלכסנדר, 1973 [1960]. סאמרהיל: גישה רדיקלית לגידול ילדים, בתרגום יהושע אורנשטיין, הוצאת יבנה, תל אביב.
